abilities.name: Deadly
abilities.description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3)

abilities.name: Corw's Veil
abilities.description: Due to had-won experience or ocult ritual, your activities are hidden from the notice of the death seeker crows. You don't take extra heat when killing is involved on a score.

abilities.name: Emberdeath
abilities.description: Due to hand-won experience or occult ritual, you know the arcane method to destroy a living victim's spirit at the moment you kill them, Take 3 stress to channel electoplasmic enegy from the ghost fielt to disintegrate the spirit and dead body in a shower of sparking embers

abilities.name: No Traces
abilities.description: When you keep an operation quiet or mak it look like an accident, you get half the rep value of the target (round up) instead of zero. When you end downtime with zero heat, take +1 rep.

abilities.name: Patron
abilities.description: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the coin it normally would, Who is your patron? Why do they help you?

abilities.name: Predators
abilities.description: When you use stealth or subtefuge to commit murder, take +1d to the engagment roll.

abilities.name: Vipers
abilities.description: When you acqire or craft poisons, you get +1 result level to your role. When you employ a poison, you are specially perpared to be immune to its effects
